```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <p>value: {{ model }}</p>
        <input-units v-model="model" v-bind="props"></input-units>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            model: '100px',
            props: {
                units: ['%', 'px', 'rem', 'em', 'fr', '$', 'â‚¬'],
            },
        };
    },
};
</script>
```
